title: Working at Heights Permit
name: Working at Heights Permit
description: Permit for work performed at heights, ensuring fall protection and safety measures are in place.

sections.title: FALL PROTECTION MEASURES
items: Collective protection provided where possible (guardrails, nets)
Personal fall arrest system (PFAS) available and inspected
Anchor points identified, tested and certified

sections.title: ACCESS EQUIPMENT & INSPECTION
items: Equipment appropriate for task and height
Safe access and egress routes established

sections.title: PPE & COMPETENCY
items: Hard hats, safety boots, high-visibility clothing worn
Full body harness fitted correctly if PFAS required
Workers trained and certified for working at height
Tool lanyards used for all hand tools

sections.title: ENVIRONMENTAL CONTROLS
items: Area below secured/barriered to prevent access
Work stopped if weather conditions deteriorate

sections.title: COMPLETION & HANDBACK
items: All tools and equipment removed from height
